ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: (ISPICKVAL(TerritoryType, "Secondary") && ( ( ( ISCHANGED(Longitude) || ISCHANGED(Latitude) ) && ( (NOT(ISBLANK(Longitude))) || (NOT(ISBLANK(Latitude))) )) || (NOT(ISBLANK(FSL__Internal_SLR_HomeAddress_Geolocation__Latitude__s))) || (NOT(ISBLANK(FSL__Internal_SLR_HomeAddress_Geolocation__Longitude__s))) || (NOT(ISBLANK( Street ))) || (NOT(ISBLANK( City ))) || (NOT(ISBLANK( Country ))) || (NOT(ISBLANK( State ))) || (NOT(ISBLANK( PostalCode ))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot save Service Territory Member of type secondary with Operating Hours or Address
